description: {"blocks":[{"key":"atntk","text":"We adapted a previously-described method (Pantazis et al., 2022) for employing Piggybac transfection to stably express doxycycline-inducible NGN2 in human iPSCs. After stable integration of NGN2, proceed to differentiate iPSCs using protocol “iNeuron differentiation from human iPSCs.” ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Piggybac-mediated stable expression of NGN2 in iPSCs for differentiation into excitatory glutamatergic neurons
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2g1mf","text":"Culture iPSCs in a 10 cm dish coated with Growth Factor Reduced Matrigel (Corning) and feed daily with Essential 8 media (ThermoFisher). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Piggybac-mediated stable expression of NGN2 in iPSCs for differentiation into excitatory glutamatergic neurons
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6v1ce","text":"Passage iPSCs with warm Accutase into Essential 8 media with   ROCK inhibitor. Plate 800,000 iPSCs into one Matrigel-coated well of a 6-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"AF78B3A04A2211EDBD5657B4E5ED7374","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4b6v4","text":"3 - 6 hours after plating, cells should be healthy and attached. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6k1mv","text":"  after transfection, select for transfected iPSCs with   puromycin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5kfi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":259200,"guid":"FB2F69E04A2411EDBD5657B4E5ED7374","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"EDDAF0204A2411EDBD5657B4E5ED7374","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1811}}}}

steps.section: Piggybac-mediated stable expression of NGN2 in iPSCs for differentiation into excitatory glutamatergic neurons
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"518b8","text":"Passage iPSCs with Accutase to a 10 cm dish when cells are confluent enough for splitting. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93g08","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"chk43","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a1qpt","text":"Continue to feed iPSCs daily with Essential 8 media without ROCK inhibitor, and confirm division of stably-expressing transfected cells (should observe local clusters of BFP-fluorescent cells). ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Piggybac-mediated stable expression of NGN2 in iPSCs for differentiation into excitatory glutamatergic neurons
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"uqv7","text":"Confirm purity of surviving transfected cells with fluorescence microscopy. When population is pure, withdraw puromycin. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Piggybac-mediated stable expression of NGN2 in iPSCs for differentiation into excitatory glutamatergic neurons
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"80m5g","text":"Proceed to culture and induction to neuronal fate using doxycycline (see “Protocol: iNeuron differentiation from human iPSCs”).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
